name: Interactive Multi-Game Demo Disc: Version 18
overview: Playable demos: Pikmin 2, Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door, Mario Pinball (GBA), and Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow. The disc also features pre-release movie trailers of the following games: Donkey Konga, Donkey Kong Jungle Beat, WWE Day of Reckoning, Tales of Symphonia, Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door, Pikmin 2, Madden NFL 2005, NCAA Football 2005, Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2005, Shark Tale, and Mega Man X: Command Mission.
